documents.document: We are all created equal and your religious beliefs should not allow for people to be treated differently bc of who they are.
The workplace, gov't offices, & gov't funded services have no right to impose their religious beliefs on others.
I'm all for religious freedom but ppl cannot impose their religious beliefs on others & gov't should never support religious restrictions...
@davidharsanyi I gave example-Some faith-based adoption services get gov't funds...they shouldn't be able to deny adoption to gay couple.
@davidharsanyi ... if their beliefs cause them to discriminate against ppl?
@davidharsanyi fine, bad wording on my part. They can speak out. But can we agree no gov't funding (not including tax exempt status) ...
@davidharsanyi but yes, they should be able to say whatever they want.
@davidharsanyi why should gov't give tax breaks to groups that will discriminate against ppl?
@davidharsanyi It seemed like you said that gov't funding to charitable institution that would not allow for gay parents to adoption is ok.
They have a right to their beliefs but not to federal funding that supports those beliefs that don't respect the riâ€¦ https://t.co/WVs7Hnu1lt
@davidharsanyi I disagree if the charitable institution is discriminating against specific groups of people.
@davidharsanyi so the fed gov't could recognize 1 religious belief above others or ppl?
@davidharsanyi so faith-based adoption services that get gov't funds should allow all couples to adopt, correct?
@davidharsanyi Fine, but the gov't also should never recognize 1 religious belief above others and especially above ppl's rights.
@SenJohnMcCain, thank you.
